modules.description: The module offers conversion functions between date/time values and representations like Ptime, Unix timestamps, and RFC 822/3339/ISO 8601 strings, alongside comparison and time difference calculations for UTC-based data. It operates on date values of type `t`, supporting tasks such as parsing API timestamps or generating standardized date strings for interoperability.

Provides functions for string manipulation, list transformations, and optional value handling. Works with basic types like strings, lists, and option types. Used to clean and normalize input data before processing in higher-level services.

Converts date/time values between Ptime, Unix timestamps, and RFC 822/3339/ISO 8601 formats, while enabling comparisons and time difference calculations. It works with `t` type values, allowing parsing of API timestamps and generation of standardized date strings. Operations include converting between representations, calculating durations, and comparing dates. Examples include serializing timestamps for HTTP headers or extracting time differences for logging.
